name: Strengthen
effect: Add an additional Power attribute die to a Power action's roll total.

name: Quicken
effect: Add an additional Finesse attribute die to a Finesse action's roll total.

name: Toughen
effect: Add an additional Resilience attribute die to a Resilience action's roll total.

name: Augment
effect: Add an additional Intellect attribute die to an Intellect action's roll total.

name: Heighten
effect: Add an additional Wits attribute die to a Wits action's roll total.

name: Perfect
effect: Add an additional Presence attribute die to a Presence action's roll total.

name: Flex
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Power attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Balance
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Finesse attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Guard
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Resilience attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Clarify
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Intellect attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Awaken
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Wits attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Influence
effect: Increase one adjacent entity’s Presence attribute die size by two pips until the next rest.

name: Bulk
effect: You or one adjacent entity can use the sum of two Power dice you roll as the roll total for any one physical action.

name: Swift
effect: Immediately use your Finesse die total as the roll total for one additional Finesse action.

name: Repair
effect: Immediately use your Resilience die total for one additional action to reduce physical status conditions.

name: Abstract
effect: Add an additional Intellect attribute die to any non-Intellect action’s roll total.

name: Restore
effect: Immediately use your Wits die total for an additional action to reduce mental status conditions.

name: Inspire
effect: You or one adjacent entity can use the sum of two Presence dice you roll as the roll total for any one mental action.

name: Punish
effect: Double the roll total of the next physical action against one selected entity.

name: Momentum
effect: Immediately repeat one physical action, using the same roll total, against the same or another viable target.

name: Sentry
effect: Elect to be the target of a physical action for which you are in range and half the roll total.

name: Second Thought
effect: Roll one action again, using all dice from both rolls as part of the dice pool.

name: Foresight
effect: Double the roll total of your next reflexive action.

name: Double-take
effect: One selected entity rolls one action again and uses the lowest die value across either roll.

name: Overpower
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Power actions.

name: Hinder
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Finesse actions.

name: Fracture
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Resilience actions.

name: Obfuscate
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Intellect actions.

name: Overwhelm
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Wits actions.

name: Outshine
effect: One selected entity takes their lowest die value for their next three Presence actions.

name: Retaliate
effect: Inflict degrees of a physical status condition you have on up to three selected targets within an encounter - 1 degree on three entities, 2 degrees on 2 entities, three degrees on 1 entity. These do not affect spirit or adrenaline

name: Multiply
effect: One physical action can affect up to three selected entities regardless of range, using the same roll total, ignoring all disadvantages.

name: Reinforce
effect: Grant you and any selected adjacent entities resistance to the next three physical actions taken against any of you.

name: Bewilder
effect: Inflict degrees of a mental status condition you have on up to three targets within an encounter - 1 degree on three entities, 2 degrees on 2 entities, three degrees on 1 entity. These do not affect spirit or adrenaline

name: Expose
effect: One selected entity is treated as vulnerable to the next three successful physical actions against it.

name: Encourage
effect: Grant you and any selected adjacent entities resistance to the next three mental actions taken against any of you

name: War Cry
effect: For up to four Power actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Beckoning Sign
effect: For up to four Finesse actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Shield Command
effect: For up to four Resilience actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Telling Rite
effect: For up to four Intellect actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Willing Voice
effect: For up to four Wits actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Harmonising Word
effect: For up to four Presence actions performed by you or any selected entity, double the roll total.

name: Break Through
effect: Select up to four entities. The next physical action against each entity cannot be rolled against.

name: Step Ahead
effect: Gain four additional Finesse actions or any manoeuvres to take at any time.

name: Endure
effect: Immediately use twice your Resilience die total for an action to reduce physical status conditions or regain Spirit for you or any adjacent entities.

name: Outwit
effect: One selected entity is treated as vulnerable to the next four successful mental actions against it.

name: Stay Alert
effect: Gain four additional Wits actions or any manoeuvres to take at any time.

name: Reassure
effect: Immediately use twice your Presence die total for an action to reduce mental status conditions or regain Spirit for your or any adjacent entities.

name: Dominate
effect: May apply your Power attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Power actions.

name: Haste
effect: May apply your Finesse attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Finesse actions.

name: Vigilance
effect: May apply your Resilience attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Resilience actions.

name: Concentrate
effect: May apply your Intellect attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Intellect actions.

name: Perspective
effect: May apply your Wits attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Wits actions.

name: Irresistible
effect: May apply your Presence attribute die total as the roll total for the next 5 Presence actions.

name: Devastating Blow
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Bleed and/or Feeble status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Paralysing Touch
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Blind and/or Paralysis status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Crushing Palm
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Petrification and/or Slow status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Perplexing Notion
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Stun and/or Confusion status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Blinding Light
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Blind and/or Burn status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Unnerving Truth
effect: Immediately inflict 5 degrees of Disturbance and/or Fear status to one entity. This does not affect Spirit or adrenaline.

name: Warroch’s Arm
effect: Roll 6 Power attribute dice and add the total for one Power action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Virimis’s Hand
effect: Roll 6 Finesse attribute dice and add the total for one Finesse action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Corservus’s Shoulder
effect: Roll 6 Resilience attribute dice and add the total for one Resilience action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Genivie’s Thought
effect: Roll 6 Intellect attribute dice and add the total for one Intellect action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Pherynne’s Eye
effect: Roll 6 Wits attribute dice and add the total for one Wits action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Belia’s Tongue
effect: Roll 6 Presence attribute dice and add the total for one Presence action, ignoring disadvantages.

name: Warroch’s Honour
effect: Round the roll total up to the nearest multiple of 5 for any Power action until the next rest.

name: Virimis’s Technique
effect: Add an additional 2d6 to the dice pool of any Finesse roll until the next rest.

name: Corservus’s Burden
effect: Treat all 1s as a value of 10 for any Resilience action until the next rest.

name: Genivie’s Focus
effect: roll four Intellect dice as your dice pool for any Intellect action until the next rest.

name: Pherynne’s Trust
effect: Roll with a +3 bonus and ignore disadvantages for any Wits action until the next rest.

name: Belia’s Guile
effect: Reroll once any 1s or 2s rolled for any Presence action until the next rest.
